pages.text: Talents are $(l)passive$() skills that $(l)don't$() require any mana.$(br2)Similarly to $(l:skills/abilities)Abilities$(), Talents can be $(l)learned$() or $(l)upgraded$() by spending $(l)Skill Points$() on it.$(br2)It can also be unlearned using $(l)Regret Points$().$(br2)Each Talent has various $(l)attributes$() that $(l)scale$() per level of the Talent.

pages.title: Relations
pages.text: $(br)Talents can be $(l)related$() to other Talents in $(l)2$() different ways.$(br2)One Talent may $(l)exclude$() another from being learned, leaving a $(l)choice$() between those talents.$(br2)Some Talents are $(l)grouped$() together, which $(l)limits$() the number of $(l)Skill Points$() that can be $(l)spent$() on Talents in that group.
